Package it.unipr.barbato.Model.Message

Class ClientOfferHandler

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.barbato.Model.Message.ClientOfferHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Handler, jakarta.jms.MessageListener
public class ClientOfferHandler extends Object implements Handler, jakarta.jms.MessageListener
The ClientOfferHandler represents a client offers for products. Implements the Handler and MessageListener interfaces.
Author:
Vincenzo Barbato 345728
